translations.Where do you want to copy this item?: Where do you want to copy this item?

translations.Creator: Creator
translations.If you drag-and-drop zip or H5P archives: If you drag-and-drop zip or H5P archives, or if you import as a new "FILE", they will be stored as such. To expand and use them, use the special "IMPORT ZIP" or "IMPORT H5P" option.
translations.You can upload up to FILE_UPLOAD_MAX_FIL: You can upload up to {{maxFiles}} files of {{maxSize}} at a time.
translations.You can upload up to one ZIP of SIZE at: You can upload up to one ZIP of {{maxSize}} at a time. On error, try to upload a smaller zip.
translations.You can upload up to one H5P of SIZE at: You can upload up to one H5P of {{maxSize}} at a time.
translations.You can upload H5P rich content by uploa: You can upload H5P rich content by uploading exported .h5p files (e.g. from H5P.com, external Moodle services, etc).
translations.Once your file is accepted, it will take: Once your file is accepted, it will take several minutes for it to be available.
translations.Click here if you are not automatically: Click here if you are not automatically redirected
translations.itemDeleteMessage_one: This item will be deleted permanently.
translations.itemDeleteMessage_other: These items will be deleted permanently.
translations.Select reason for flagging this item: Select reason for flagging this item
translations.This item is public. Anyone can access t: This item is public. Anyone can access this item.
translations.This item enables item login. New users: This item enables item login. New users can access this item when they authenticate using the item login.
Choose one of the following action.
No user has access to this item.
translations.No user has authenticated to this item y: No user has authenticated to this item yet.
translations.This item is accessible if the visitor p: This item is accessible if the visitor provides a
translations.This item is public. Anyone can access i: This item is public. Anyone can access it.
translations.This element is published. Anyone can ac: This element is published. Anyone can access it and is available on Graasp Library, our public repository of learning ressources.
translations.This item is private. Only authorized me: This item is private. Only authorized members can access it.
translations.Provide an image to update your thumbnai: Provide an image to update your thumbnail. You might need to refresh the page to see the changes.
translations.Crop your chosen image to fit the image: Crop your chosen image to fit the image size requirements.
translations.Eg. English, Biology, Lab, Plants, ...,: Eg. English, Biology, Lab, Plants, ..., Demo
translations.We use cookies and other tracking techno: We use cookies and other tracking technologies to improve your browsing experience on our website, to analyze our website traffic, and to understand where our visitors are coming from. By browsing our website, you consent to our use of cookies and other tracking technologies.
translations.You can download your resources from gra: You can download your resources from graasp.eu by right clicking and choosing "Download as ZIP".
translations.Once your file is accepted, it will take: Once your file is accepted, it will take several minutes for all imported files to be available.
translations.All content published on Graasp Library: All content published on Graasp Library does not allow commercial use.
translations.Allow adaptations of your work to be sha: Allow adaptations of your work to be shared?
translations.Need more info about CC License? Click h: Need more info about CC License? Click here!
translations.Please verify that your item fits the CC: Please verify that your item fits the CC License, and do not change to a more restricted option.
translations.itemValidationFailureMessage: Your item might contain inappropriate content. Please remove them and validate your item again. If you have any question, please contact {{contact, string}}.
translations.You can publish your collection to Graas: You can publish your collection to Graasp Library, our open educational resource library.
translations.Published collections are accessible by: Published collections are accessible by the public.
translations.To publish your collection, please follo: To publish your collection, please follow the three steps below.
translations.You need to validate your item before pu: You need to validate your item before publish it. Please allow some time for the validation to finish.
translations.Once your item is validated, you can set: Once your item is validated, you can set your item to published by clicking the button.
translations.Set the options for your resource to mak: Set the options for your resource to make it easily accessible by the public.
translations.Your item is pending validation. Once th: Your item is pending validation. Once the validation succeeds, you will be able to publish your item.
translations.Your account will be deleted permanently: Your account will be deleted permanently.
translations.This membership is defined in the parent: This membership is defined in the parent item and cannot be deleted here.
No invitation for this item yet.
translations.Non-registered users will receive a pers: Non-registered users will receive a personal link to register on the platform.
translations.This invitation is defined in the parent: This invitation is defined in the parent item and cannot be deleted here.
translations.Do you want to display co-editors after: Do you want to display co-editors after published? All users with edit permission will be displayed.
translations.Send email notifications to all co-edito: Send email notifications to all co-editors
translations.A CSV entry cannot override the data alr: A CSV entry cannot override the data already saved. If a user already has permission, update the value in the table manually.
translations.Import users from a CSV file: Import users from a CSV file
translations.Your CSV should have at least the column: Your CSV should have at least the column 'email'. The columns 'name' and 'permission' are optional.
translations.The import failed for these entries: The import failed for these entries
translations.sharedWithMembers_one: This item is shared with one user
translations.sharedWithMembers_other: This item is shared with {{count}} users
